author: Simon Hill
title: How the Apple TV 4K Quickly Became My Favorite Streaming Device
description: This premium streaming box is a top-notch smart home hub and should be the heart of any Apple household.
content: For years, I've had recurring problems using smart home devices on Apples HomeKit ecosystem. A string of security cameras and video doorbells, most notably the Logitech Circle View Doorbell, would woâ€¦ [+3658 chars]
